title: 99/521/EC: Commission Decision of 9 July 1999 amending Decision 95/124/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Germany (notified under document number C(1999) 2040) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 9 July 1999
amending Decision 95/124/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Germany
(notified under document number C(1999) 2040)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/521/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 95/124/EC is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
